001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector.BaseDbConnectorService;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
007import lombok.Getter;
008import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
009import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
010
011/**
012 * Manages database clients for handling database interactions.
013 *
014 * <p>This class caches and retrieves database clients based on the provided
015 * database configuration, ensuring efficient reuse of connections.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019@Component
020public class DbClientManager {
021
022   private final Map<String, DbClient> clientCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
023   @Getter
024   private final BaseDbConnectorService connector;
025
026   /**
027    * Constructs a new {@code DbClientManager} with the given database connector service.
028    *
029    * @param connector The service responsible for establishing database connections.
030    */
031   @Autowired
032   public DbClientManager(final BaseDbConnectorService connector) {
033      this.connector = connector;
034   }
035
036   /**
037    * Retrieves a database client based on the given configuration.
038    *
039    * <p>If a client is already cached for the given configuration, it is reused.
040    * Otherwise, a new client is initialized.
041    *
042    * @param dbConfig The database configuration for which a client is required.
043    * @return A {@code DbClient} instance corresponding to the configuration.
044    */
045   public DbClient getClient(DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
046      String urlKey = dbConfig.getFullConnectionString() != null
047            ? dbConfig.getFullConnectionString()
048            : dbConfig.buildUrlKey();
049
050      return clientCache.computeIfAbsent(urlKey, key -> initializeDbClient(dbConfig));
051   }
052
053   /**
054    * Initializes a new database client instance.
055    *
056    * @param dbConfig The configuration used to initialize the client.
057    * @return A new instance of {@code DbClient}.
058    */
059   protected DbClient initializeDbClient(final DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
060      return new RelationalDbClient(connector, dbConfig);
061   }
062
063}
064
